name: heroine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a woman who is admired for having done something very brave or having achieved something great: She is remembered as a heroine of the French Resistance. The nursery nurse who protected the children was hailed a heroine.
the main female character in a book or film, who is usually good: the heroine of her latest novel fairy-tale heroines such as Snow White Madame Butterfly, Puccini's tragic heroine
a woman who you admire very much: My grandmother is my heroine. The human rights lawyer has long been a heroine of hers.
